newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - March 20.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - March 20.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following stories on the front page of its business section on Thursday:
WASHINGTON - Consumer prices rose more last month than they did in January, but the report from the Labor Department indicated inflation remains well in check.
WASHINGTON - Washington Gas Light Co. said the average homeowner's monthly heating bill has been reduced by about $20 for both February and March because of a 30 percent drop in natural gas prices.
WASHINGTON - The National Transportation Safety Board is gathering evidence than many more auto crash victims die from failure to wear seat belts than from air bag deployments.
WASHINGTON - President Clinton and congressional Republicans remain in a tug of war over how to balance the federal budget.
